## Biography

Eleanore completed her BSc at the University of Toronto, specializing in forest conservation science, ecology and evolutionary biology, and GIS with a summer semester doing ecology work in Haida Gwaii. Eleanore is presently a research assistant and lab technician helping process data on mountain pine beetle and forest fire interactions in British Columbia and peatland fire ignitions in Alberta. She has spent 4 summers in British Columbia and Alberta planting trees.
